text: # 2.5.3 Feasibility, acceptability, resources and equity considerations Evidence came from a review of systematic reviews (as presented in Web Annex A), and a survey of the GDG members.A review of systematic reviews of the acceptability, feasibility, resources and equity considerations for the use of different screening tests included systematic reviews published since 2010 that synthesized results from studies with quantitative or qualitative designs.
